results.name: Sum of quadratic residues of (n-th prime == 3 mod 4).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
Aebi, Christian, and Grant Cairns. Sums of Quadratic residues and nonresidues, arXiv preprint arXiv:1512.00896 (2015).
maple: for j from 1 to p-1 do
if legendre(j,p)=1 then sp:=sp+j; else sm:=sm+j; fi; od;
mathematica: Table[Table[Mod[a^2, p], {a, 1, (p-1)/2}]//Total, {p, Select[Prime[Range[100]], Mod[#, 4]==3 &]}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 21 2017 *)
program: apply(do, select(p->p%4==3, primes(100))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 21 2017
xref: Sums of residues, nonresidues, and their differences, for p == 1 mod 4, p == 3 mod 4, and all p: A171555; A282035, A282036, A282037; A076409, A125615, A282038.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 20 2017
